      class  WayPoint 

    • Uses of Drawable in SimulationFramework

      Classes in SimulationFramework that implement Drawable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Connector
      Connector is used to draw lines between points on the simulation's canvas.
      class  Marker
      Markers are used to represent position on the canvas that Bot's can use for path finding.
      Methods in SimulationFramework with parameters of type Drawable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AnimatePanel.addPermanentDrawable(Drawable d)
      Store Markers or Connectors as permanent drawable objects.
      void AnimatePanel.addTemporaryDrawable(Drawable d)
      Store Markers or Connectors as temporary drawable objects.
